name: Madness: Bullet Hell
description:
dodge funny bullets as a funny grunt or u gonna die a painfull death. tricky already died bc u keep saying hes from fnf. (no offense to ninjamuffin_09)

the bullets move as you move

also go check out madness combat because its epic as ass series: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/58182

play in full screen: https://madness-bullet-hell-site.alexplayrus1.repl.co/

dont say that grunt is fat

fun fact: this game is fully open for discussions so feel free to talk about original madness combat, fan games and this game!

this is open source on replit so feel free to mod it on my official page (replit username is Alexplayrus1)

this game is fully free to play and no donations need!

ok u can start gaeming after fully reading this
